name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior QA Engineer with 10+ years of experience in ensuring high-quality software solutions within healthcare and finance sectors. Proven expertise in **API** testing, **test automation**, and **performance testing**, with a strong focus on **debugging** and maintaining data integrity in complex systems. Skilled in collaborating with development teams to assess and improve existing **backend** processes, ensuring robust **distributed systems** through effective problem-solving strategies. Experienced in both **batch** and **streaming data processing**, delivering real-world impact through efficient solutions. Proficient in utilizing CI/CD automation and embracing an autonomous work ethic for continuous improvement. Equipped with a comprehensive understanding of **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and cloud environments including **Azure** and **AWS**, coupled with a passion for quality assurance and system performance.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and executed comprehensive **test automation** strategies for backend APIs, utilizing **QA** tools and methodologies to ensure data integrity and system performance.
•	Conducted rigorous **performance testing** and **load testing** on distributed systems, ensuring robust response times and system reliability.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to maintain high standards in **debugging** and **problem solving**, enhancing communication across development and testing environments.
•	Designed and implemented automated test cases for scalable applications built with **Node.js**, **Python (FastAPI)**, and integrated with popular frameworks like **React** and **Next.js** to ensure seamless user interactions.
•	Utilized advanced **API** testing techniques to validate endpoints, covering data flow, functional behavior, and edge cases across at least **3 major projects**.
•	Oversaw the integration of **streaming data processing** tools to facilitate real-time data validation and **batch data processing** for handling large data sets, ensuring optimal system performance under varied loads.
•	Developed customized dashboards to visualize testing metrics and enhance the tracking of project progress, utilizing tools like **Power BI Embedded** and **Chart.js**.
•	Maintained high standards in **test strategy development** using frameworks such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Postman** to automate testing processes and ensure thorough coverage of both frontend and backend services.
•	Engaged in continuous improvement initiatives by applying **problem-solving** techniques and providing feedback on system architecture and performance to foster development best practices.
•	Ensured thorough documentation of the **test automation** process, facilitating knowledge sharing and redundancy reduction within the QA team.

Conducted comprehensive **QA** practices for high-availability financial platforms, utilizing **API** testing methodologies to ensure system reliability and data integrity for transactions.
Executed **test automation** routines for backend services built on **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enabling faster deployment cycles and improved defect discovery rates by **30%**.
Performed rigorous **performance testing** and **load testing** on microservices, assessing the scalability and efficiency of high-volume transaction systems under simulated user loads exceeding **10,000 transactions** per minute.
Collaborated with developers and product teams on debugging and problem-solving initiatives, effectively communicating issues and enhancements in a distributed systems environment.
Designed and maintained ETL pipelines utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, ensuring data quality and batch processing that handled **1TB** of financial data daily.
Engaged in **streaming data processing** with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, supporting real-time transaction analysis and alerts for over **50** different financial activities.
Developed automated testing strategies integrating real-time operational features and analytics dashboards, enhancing the team’s autonomy and responsiveness to system changes while maintaining stringent data integrity standards.

Executed rigorous **QA** processes to ensure functionality and performance of backend services, employing testing strategies across distributed systems and cloud services.
Conducted thorough **API** testing for various services built on **FastAPI**, **Django**, **NestJS**, and **Express**, achieving a **95%** test coverage rate that enhanced reliability across the application.
Implemented comprehensive **test automation** using tools like Selenium and Cypress, achieving a **30%** reduction in regression testing time while maintaining data integrity.
Designed and executed **performance testing** and **load testing** strategies to assess service reliability under peak loads, improving system throughput by **40%**.
Utilized **streaming data processing** technologies such as **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** in the development of real-time features, enabling accurate tracking of application performance metrics.
Created detailed documentation and reports highlighting testing outcomes, issues, and success metrics, fostering clear **communication** across cross-functional teams.
Demonstrated strong **problem-solving** skills to quickly troubleshoot and debug issues in the development pipeline, leading to an improvement in deployment frequency by **50%**.
Exercised significant **autonomy** in prioritizing testing workflows and managing quality gates, successfully completing projects with minimal oversight.
Participated in collaborative team discussions to improve test strategies and methodologies, continuously enhancing the overall quality of the product delivered to end-users.
